text.div:
Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    42368-1 Neisseria meningitidis w135 Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42369-9 Neisseria meningitidis A Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination

    42372-3 Neisseria meningitidis D Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42373-1 Neisseria meningitidis X Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42374-9 Neisseria meningitidis Y Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42375-6 Neisseria meningitidis Z Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    42376-4 Neisseria meningitidis Z' Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Agglutination
    44093-3 Neisseria meningitidis [Identifier] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    45183-1 Neisseria meningitidis [Identifier] in Isolate by Agglutination
    73702-3 Neisseria meningitidis serosubtype [Type] in Isolate by Immunoassay
    85779-7 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] by Target amplification with non-probe based detection in Positive blood culture
    86581-6 Neisseria meningitidis [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Organism specific culture
